page.title: 20GOVERNMENT
page.content: IN BRITAIN THE MAJOR POLITICAL PARTIES ARE THE CONSERVATIVES,THE LABOUR PARTY AND THE S.D.P.LIBERAL ALLIANCE.HISTOR ICALLY THE CONSERVATIVES REPRESENT THE WEALTH LANDOWNING SECTION OF THE COMMUNITY AND THE LABOUR PARTY THE WOR KERS.ONE OF THESE PARTIES IS ELECTED DEMOCRATICALLY EVERY 4 YEARS.IT HOLDS A MAJORITY IN THE HOUSE OF COMMONS.AT PRESENT MARGARET THATCHER IS PRIME MINISTER.LOCAL GOVERNMENT ELECTIONS ARE HELD ANNUALLY.BIRMINGHAM IS LABOUR GOV- ERNED AT PRESENT. CONFLICT OFTEN OCCURS WHEN LOCAL GOVERN MENT IS NOT THE SAME AS CENTRAL GOVERN MENT.MATTERS OF GREAT NATIONAL IMPORTANCE AT THE MOMENT ARE RUNDOWN INNER RING AREAS OF LARGE CITIES,RACIAL DISCRIMINATION,UNEMPLOYMENT,DEPLOYMENT OF NUCLEAR WEAPONS AND TEACHERS' PAY.
